name: Evil tree
description:
Game Jam theme: Expansion.

Team: Marco Minganna (Programmer)-Dario Splendido (3D artist/https://www.artstation.com/dariosplendido?fbclid=IwAR0rgmgE-0wl46syw9N3GfhOsPQe2...)

How to play:

Keyboard: 

Movements: wasd - interact: space bar - crouch: q -punch the tree: e

GamePad: 

Movements: left analog stick  -interact: O(right button) - crouch: x (down button) -punch the tree: triangle (up button)

Gameplay: 

Explore the forest and feast with the creatures that inhabit it. after consuming a creature your body will grow. the scope of the game is to grow to a size that allows you to fight the evil tree.
